Room.Name: Evenborough Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Evenborough Way, south of the Evenborough Park.
Room.LongDescription: The grassy green park stands as a reminder of what nature is like and how it must be preserved. Since the city is surrouned by a large city wall, not many people ever leave the city to explore the wilderness. Small parks like this one serve as a substitute. On the south side of the road, you can see the Evermore Development Agency, a large group of architechs that manages the building of new buildings in Oceancrest.
